analysis: The current implementation has regressed compared to previous scores. Both baseline and enhanced components show minimal implementation of required fields and functionality. The enhanced version adds basic accessibility attributes and animation but lacks comprehensive form fields, validation, and proper UX states.

strategyRecommendations.name: CompleteFormImplementation
strategyRecommendations.description: Implement all required form fields with validation as specified in the prompt

strategyRecommendations.name: EnhanceARIAsemantics
strategyRecommendations.description: Add complete ARIA attributes for all form controls including aria-required, aria-invalid, and aria-describedby for error messages

strategyRecommendations.name: AddValidationFeedback
strategyRecommendations.description: Implement real-time validation with clear, accessible error messages linked to fields

strategyRecommendations.name: ImproveResponsiveLayout
strategyRecommendations.description: Implement the specified single-column mobile and two-column desktop layouts with appropriate spacing

strategyRecommendations.name: ImplementLoadingStates
strategyRecommendations.description: Add loading, success, and error states with appropriate feedback mechanisms
